e_header: Translating the Voice of the Customer
e_text:
Design input includes the voice of the customer, regulatory requirements, and information taken from similar product ideas.

While all of these are important, the most vital is the voice of the customer.

The House of Quality (HOQ) is a commonly used tool for capturing the voice of the customer. It helps to ensure the customer's wants and needs are top-of-mind throughout the process. 3M teams often use a streamlined version of the HOQ called the Linear House of Quality (LHOQ).

If a House of Quality tool is not required by your division, it is likely that your division uses a similar tool for tracking information throughout the commercialization process. For the purpose of your learning journey, we will explore the LHOQ as our example.
